name: Danganronpa Another Episode: Ultra Despair Girls
summary: Danganronpa Another Episode: Ultra Despair Girls is a horror action adventure spin-off game in the Danganronpa series of visual novel games, taking place between the events of Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc and Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair. Unlike the visual novel gameplay of the previous games, Ultra Despair Girls is a third-person adventure game with horror elements, in which players control Komaru Naegi as she tries to survive in a city overrun by Monokuma robots.

alternative_names.name: 絶対絶望少女 ダンガンロンパ Another Episode
Zettai Zetsubou Shoujo: Danganronpa Another Episode

esrb.synopsis: This is a third-person shooter in which players help two high-school students escape a city. As players move through the city, they can switch between each character and use a Hacking Gun and scissors to destroy robotic bears. A handful of cutscenes depict additional acts of violence: characters impaled by bolts; robotic bears stabbing and killing civilians; a character's legs slashed with knives. Blood is frequently depicted on and around corpses. The game contains some sexual material: camera angles highlighting characters' underwear; characters making sexual remarks (e.g., “I've heard women are the best just before they're ripe, but this is beyond my expectations” and “Ufufu, put that lewd body of yours to work and you'll never go hungry.”). In one sequence, players must slap away groping robotic hands from a bound female character. A protracted fantasy sequence depicts a character's hands grasping sheets; sexual moaning sounds can be heard. The words “f**k” and “sh*t” are heard in dialogue.
